[url=/article/item_id-480076#][/url]
确实是带有一些抱怨性的发言，感谢批评，会认真看一下PDF

[url=/article/item_id-480076#][/url]
pdf里的确提到了“Democrats will pursue this strategy without resorting to self-defeating, unilateral tariff wars or
falling into the trap of a new Cold War. Those mistakes would only serve to exaggerate China’s
weight...”，基本是你说的的直译
